comment.author: 78598560@N00
comment._content: There is Mr Mike's Steaks next to the Studio.  A fabulous Steak dinner with all the fixings for $5 or $6 including a salad bar.  After a good steak over to the Studio Theatre for the latest British or European movie.  (How about Ingmar Bergman's latest flick?) Then over to the Movieland Arcade for a little time wasting.
